name: h3
description: Elevate your game with the 2026 DeMarini CF® (-9) Fastpitch Softball Bat, engineered for powerful and consistent performance. Its Paraflex™ Plus Composite Barrel ensures a massive sweet spot, delivering reliability and responsiveness with every swing. Designed for stronger high school and college players, the CF (-9) utilizes a Type-V™ Connection to reduce hand-stinging vibrations, allowing you to focus on turning barreled-up pitches into extra-base hits. Certified for USSSA, USA Softball, NSA, ISA, and WBSC, this balanced bat comes in a striking white, pink, and purple colorway, with a Tracer End Cap to enhance bat speed and performance. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
